alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Du Pont, or 10 miles northeast of Lakeland, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
